div.p: You know that your kids have something special inside them. We know it, too. Utah Virtual Academy (UTVA) and K12 ignite the minds of children like yours to bring learning and innate possibility alive. Together, we are helping Utah students in grades K–12 reach their true, personal potential.

UTVA students benefit from parent involvement, innovative teaching, and school accountability within a virtual environment that embraces individual learning styles, giving Utah kids the chance to learn in the ways that are right for them. UTVA offers:

ul.li: Full- and part-time, tuition-free* online public school options
An opportunity for eligible students to earn college credit while in high school
Destinations Career Academy at UTVA for full- or part-time high school students, offering compelling, high-interest courses that introduce a variety of possible careers
Books, materials, and loaner computer system available for eligible families
The only statewide virtual public charter school in the state to offer the complete K12-powered school experience
A high school diploma that meets all state requirements.
